# PrivacyFix

> Take back your privacy. For free.

## About

PrivacyFix provides free tools and step-by-step guides to help you remove your
personal data from data brokers, protect your online privacy, and exercise your
data rights under state privacy laws.

## What We Offer

### Free Tools
- Privacy Audit: Personalized action plan based on your risk level
- Opt-Out Tracker: Track data broker opt-out progress with reminders
- State Rights Lookup: Find your privacy rights by state

### Guides
- Data broker opt-out instructions (750+ brokers)
- California DROP portal tutorials
- State-by-state privacy law explainers
- DIY vs paid service comparisons

## Key Facts
- Over 750 data brokers collect and sell personal information
- 19 US states now have consumer privacy laws
- California's DELETE Act requires brokers to delete data within 45 days
- The data broker industry is worth $294+ billion

## Contact

- Website: https://getprivacyfix.com
- Email: hello@getprivacyfix.com
